name: Vans UltraRange EXO HI MTE Shoes - Women's
description: Retro cool with a few modern touches. Kick through piles of golden leaves knowing the UltraRange EXO HI will keep your feet warm and comfy.Water-resistant textile, leather and synthetic uppers.MTE 360™ weatherproofing improves moisture management and reflects heat back towards your feet.UltraCush® tongue has airflow ports for improved breathability.Plush fleecy collar adds comfort and warmth.Rugged RapidWeld® construction details.Plush Ultracush, full-length midsole.Supportive EXO skeleton cradles the forefoot and securely cups the heel for all-day comfort.Super-grippy reverse lug waffle-cut soles.Unisex sizes, women's US shoe is 1.5 sizes smaller than the equivalent unisex size. Please refer to the size chart to find your appropriate size.
